text: Valentine John "Val" Bettin (July 8, 1923 - January 7, 2021) was an American actor and voice artist known for using an English accent in all of his roles. He is perhaps best known for voicing Dr. David Q. Dawson in the 1986 Disney animated movie The Great Mouse Detective and the Sultan in The Return of Jafar (1994) and Aladdin and the King of Thieves (1996). ==References== ==Other websites== * *Val Bettin at the Great Mouse Detective fansite Category:1923 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Wisconsin
title: Val Bettin
